abstract: David Hearn takes two-stroke lead at Canadian Open with four-under-par 68; other golf news noted.
lead_paragraph: Hearn moved into position to become the first Canadian to win the Canadian Open in 61 years, taking a two-stroke lead over Bubba Watson and Jason Day.

headline.main: David Hearn Leads on Home Turf

snippet: Hearn moved into position to become the first Canadian to win the Canadian Open in 61 years, taking a two-stroke lead over Bubba Watson and Jason Day.
